All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
Callback
Used as a callback functionality in MenuUI
Category
Used as a field in Product
Command
Used internally in MenuUI to hold a variable ArrayList of commands
Item
Used internally as base class for Product and Offer
Market
A class that executes the purpose of holding product and products in offer data inside of ArrayLists, supports bi-directional menus and supports adding, deleting, removing, searching, editing and viewing of both Offer and Product instances
MenuUI
A class that handles both UI and functionality for a numbered choice menu on console
NoCommandsAvailableException
An exception for MenuUI class
Offer
A class holding some shop's offer data plus one instance of Product used in Market class
Product
A class holding some shop's product data
